name: Carnival Shootout
summary:
Welcome to the Tivoli! Carnival Shootout is a classic Tivoli shooting alley game where you have to hit as many moving animal targets as possible with your air gun. On each level there are different animals that move across the shooting alley. Pick them off before they disappear again.

The game is played over 3 levels with different animals. Collect enough points to qualify for the later levels. Each animal has a target zone that increases the score if you hit it, so a careful aim pays off. Avoid shooting the animals carrying a white flag, and hitting the target zone of the animals with a golden flag will trigger a secret animal.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 动作
  • 游玩人数: 单人
